item.title: J.D. Souther - You're Only Lonely
item.description:
작곡: Sung by / 작사: J.D.Souther
KY: 8959 / KY: 7588

When the world is
read to fall
On your
little shoulder
And when you’re
feeling lonely
And small
you need somebody
There to hold you
you can call
Out my name
when you’re
Only lonely
now don’t you
Ever be a shamed
you’re only lonely-

When you need
somebody around
On your nights
that try you
I was there when
you were a queen
And I’ll be the
last one there
Beside you
so you can call
Out my name
when you’re
Only lonely
now don’t you
Ever be a shamed
you’re only lonely-

Woo when the world is
ready to fall
On your
little shoulder
And when you’re
feeling lonely
And small
you need somebody
There to hold you
so don’t you
Ever by a shamed
when you’re
Only lonely
darling call
Out my name
when you’re
Only lonely
when you’re
Only lonely
it’s on crime
Darling we got
lots of time
Woh woh
there’s nothing wrong
With you darling I got
lonely do woh-
So if you need me
all you’ve
Gotta do
is call me
Well you’re
only lonely woo-
